Episodes.Title: Wake Up Call (1)
Episodes.Plot: It's been one year since the 4400 returned.  After a period of intense medical observation, Tom has returned to NTAC in a limited capacity, assigned only to desk duty.  Diana, having been through a series of inept partners, finally finds a way to cut through the red tape and get Tom back, all while in the midst of formally adopting Maia.  Meanwhile, Richard, Lily and the baby are still living in meager conditions in a mountain cabin far away from Jordan.  Jordan has now closed Arcadia Estates, a
Episodes.GuestStars: Dawn  Chubai, Sean Tyson, Charles Napier, Jason Griffith, Grace Bauer, Darryl Quon, Avery Tiplady, Nick Misura, Trevor Roberts, Noah Beggs, Julian Christopher, Michael Ryan, Patricia Harras, Graeme Duffy, Bill Mon

Episodes.Title: Voices Carry
Episodes.Plot: Gary Navarro, a minor league baseball player back after a 30-year absence, finds that hearing everyone's unspoken thoughts is driving him to the edge of madness. When he seeks help from NTAC, the higher-ups are more interested in how he can unearth information about Jordan Collier than how they can assist Gary with getting his life back. As the case occupies the majority of his time, Tom finds himself struggling with his responsibilities as a single father. Meanwhile, Kyle starts to get his life
Episodes.GuestStars: Lexa Doig,  Candus Churchill,  Stephen McHattie,  Sharif Atkins,  Parker  Holdsworth,  Jennifer Gibson,  Robert Seckler,  Richard  De Kler,  Darren E. Scott,  Doug Abrahams,  John Dadey,  P.J. Prinsloo,  Woody J

Episodes.Title: Weight of the World
Episodes.Plot: Someone puts his 4400 ability up for auction, and the Supreme Court will have a special session to determine if it's legal and if the auction can continue. Diana and Tom are ordered to investigate. Meanwhile, pop diva Chloe Granger is at the 4400 Center and claims that Jordan's book was a revelation to her. She even cut her tour short because she felt she needed to come to the 4400 Center and become a student. Jordan makes sure this new "recruit" is well treated as it will profit the center. Sha
Episodes.GuestStars: Glen Gould,  Lucia Walters,  Carmen Moore,  Noah Danby,  Katey Wright,  Colin Lawrence,  Peter Hanlon,  Peter Huck,  Paul Jarrett,  Rhonda Dent,  Michael Rogers,  Robert Picardo,  Noa Tishby,  Lexa Doig

Episodes.Title: Suffer the Children
Episodes.Plot: A school teacher terrifies parents with her supernatural ability to inspire artistic students.  Meanwhile, Richard and Lily are confronted by police, and Jordan warns Shawn not to overuse his healing gift.
Episodes.GuestStars: Edd  Wright,  Stefan  Thordarson,  Santana   Shaw-Garlock,  Mylene Robic,  Rick Dobran,  Sean Owen Roberts,  Ben Cotton,  Kyle  Falconer,  D. Harlan Cutshall,  Rob Hayter,  Brett Delaney,  Bruce Dawson,  Jaren B

Episodes.Title: As Fate Would Have It
Episodes.Plot: Maia sees a vision of Jordan Collier's death. Kyle's frightening blackouts are disrupting Tom's personal life. Diana is asked to hand over Maia's diary to NTAC.
Episodes.GuestStars: Lindy Booth,  Genevieve Buechner,  Robert Clarke,  Alistair Abell,  Lexa Doig,  Igor Morozov,  Andrew Airlie,  Sean Owen Roberts

Episodes.Title: Life Interrupted
Episodes.Plot: Tom and Diana track down a man to a museum, and during the chase, Tom finds a mysterious lab that only he can see. Later at the office, Tom finds that all his 4400 case files are gone, and no one has ever heard of the 4400.
Episodes.GuestStars: Marshall  Caplan,  Allison Warnyca,  Don MacKay,  Mark Burgess,  Richard Hendery,  Maureen Thomas,  Brooke Nevin

Episodes.Title: Carrier
Episodes.Plot: After living for 8 years in an alternate world that only Tom and Alana remember the world with the 4400 has returned as it was at the second the 8 years started. A 30 year old 4400 woman wakes up and finds everybody else in her local community dead. Maia puts April's love for her to a test.
Episodes.GuestStars: Craig March,  Sean Devine,  Daniel Bacon,  Jason  Benson,  Daniella Evangelista,  Matias  Hacker,  Sage Brocklebank,  David Purvis,  Julius Chapple,  Sherilyn Fenn

Episodes.Title: Rebirth
Episodes.Plot: A male 4400 originally from Rwanda repairs bad chromosomes of unborn. Kyle is utterly despaired as he suddenly remembers what he did during his blackout. Rishard attends a co-veteran's funeral. Diana takes s hard family decision.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jodie Graham,  Matias  Hacker,  Suzette Meyers,  Myfanwy Meilen,  Lovie Eli,  Brandi Alexander,  John R. Taylor,  Patricia Drake,  Beau Starr,  Luke Askew,  Michael Jonsson,  Link Baker,  Hill Harper

Episodes.Title: Hidden
Episodes.Plot: NTAC is keen to find Jordan Collier's killer as Tom is desperate to find Kyle.
Episodes.GuestStars: Lindy Booth,  Jared Keeso,  Simon Hayama,  Amy Adamson,  Gary Sekhon,  Elizabeth Thai,  Katia Khatchadourian,  Lexa Doig,  Teach

Episodes.Title: Lockdown
Episodes.Plot: On John Colliers' birthday NTAC receives threatening e-mails and gets attacked by terror. Kyle is concerned that an innocent will be convicted for killing Collier. Maia gets a mysterious infection and is treated at NTAC. Isabelle has broken off her special communication with her mother and transfers it to her father. At school a girl is very interested in Kyle.
Episodes.GuestStars: Colleen Winton,  Karen Austin,  Tyler McClendon,  Rob Lee,  Arnold  Cheng,  Leanne Adachi,  Tony Parsons,  Hiro Kanagawa,  Tom Verica,  Roger R. Cross,  Sean Devine,  Valerie Sing Turner,  Mark Gibbon,  Cheryl Mu

Episodes.Title: The Fifth Page (1)
Episodes.Plot: The authorities led by Dennis Hyland wants to quarantine every 4400, as several of them are sick with the same as Maia. Hunted by bad conscience Kyle somehow contacts Marsden's girlfriend.
Episodes.GuestStars: Maria  Dimou,  J. Douglas Stewart,  Christie Wilkes,  Ken Jones,  Nicolas Von Zill,  Peter Benson,  Valerie Sing Turner,  Keegan Connor Tracy,  Tom Verica,  Harris Allan,  Colleen Winton

Episodes.Title: Mommy's Bosses (2)
Episodes.Plot: 7 of the 4400 have died and Maia gets worse all the time Out of suspicion and despair Diana threatens Dr. Hudson with a gun. Lily has run away with Isabelle and Richard pleads he to come back. Marsdem seems unable to avoid a long prison term which makes Alison contact Kyle.
Episodes.GuestStars: Tom Verica,  Keegan Connor Tracy,  Jonah  Bay,  Nancy Sorel,  Christie Wilkes,  Christie Laing
